alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:02PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elbert, Arapahoe, southwestern Washington, southeastern Adams and north central Lincoln Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Bennett to 6 miles east of Agate, or along a line extending from 25 miles east of Denver to 16 miles northwest of Limon. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennett, Deer Trail, Byers, Agate, Cottonwood Valley and Strasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Washington County
